name: bolt
description: A front-end toolkit of classes and evented behaviours.

scripts.build: npm run build-module && npm run build-css && npm run build-docs
scripts.build-docs: node ../fn/build-html.js index.template.html index.html && node ../fn/build-html.js rotary-control.template.html rotary-control.html
scripts.publish: git pull origin master && npm run build-css && npm run build-module && git add --all && git commit -am 'Builds version 2.1.1' && git push
